attributes.action: No bail out for virgin Atlantic because of corona virus.
attributes.additional_details: Simple life is far more important that multi billion pound company's and all government money should be put to saving lives than saving billionaires
attributes.background: Prioritise individual health and all people risking lives in pandemic over corporate greed

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302992

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
